"""
Chunk Context: OpenGL Configuration Settings

This section contains configuration variables related to OpenGL graphics 
rendering, including options for managing texture memory barriers and forcing 
glFinish() calls. These settings primarily affect rendering performance and 
synchronization behavior in Panda3D applications.

gl-enable-memory-barriers:
    Controls whether memory barriers are issued after image writes to ensure proper
    synchronization of texture reads/writes.

gl-finish:
    Forces a call to glFinish() after major graphics operations, improving PStats 
    accuracy at the cost of rendering performance.
"""

barrier before the next use of said texture, to ensure that all reads
and writes are properly synchronized. This may not be strictly necessary
when using the 'coherent' qualifier, but Panda has no way to detect
whether you are using those. Turning this off may give a slight
